siteMetadata.title: Christopher Froehlich's Blog | Hiking My Desk

node.excerpt: Friends of family, family of friends, and persons unconnected to either, You may now pull forth your journals, note pads or stick-it notes…
Friends of the U.S. Armed Forces, This may be the last email that I send for some time, and by 'some time,' I of course mean, I have no idea…
